attributes.long-description:
Tales from Space: About a Blob is a side-scrolling puzzle-platformer about a race of insatiable alien Blobs. Looking for their next meal, the Blobs end up on a distant Earth-like planet that didn’t invite them for dinner.

Players interact with the game environment using unique growth and absorption-related control mechanics, experiencing the world at vastly different scales as they progress. Special abilities help the Blobs navigate the hostile human world.

Key Features:
- Grow to massive proportions. Eat savory humans, farm animals and everything else!
- Delicious local co-op support.
- Tasty Puzzles: Low in fat and high in fun.
- Appetizing, retro-inspired art style.
- Exquisite Blob abilities: Use magnetism and electricity to find your next meal.
- Lip-smacking Trophies and Home Rewards, plus Leaderboards!

This premium bundle includes the full game, co-op level pack and premium costume pack. Download it today!

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
